author: pcaversaccio
content:
I think we as an industry should push more towards using Podman instead of Docker due to the security benefits coming with Podman. I went through all main EL & CL docs and _nobody_ mentions even Podman:
Nethermind: https://docs.nethermind.io/get-started/installing-nethermind/#docker-container
Geth: https://geth.ethereum.org/docs/getting-started/installing-geth#docker-container
Besu: https://besu.hyperledger.org/private-networks/get-started/install/run-docker-image
Erigon: https://docs.erigon.tech/installation/docker
Reth: https://reth.rs/installation/docker/
Lighthouse: https://lighthouse-book.sigmaprime.io/installation_docker.html
Lodestar: https://chainsafe.github.io/lodestar/run/getting-started/installation#docker-installation
Nimbus: https://nimbus.guide/docker.html
Prysm: https://prysm.offchainlabs.com/docs/install-prysm/install-with-docker/
Teku: https://docs.teku.consensys.net/get-started/install/run-docker-image
Grandine: https://docs.grandine.io/downloads.html#docker

are client teams open to at least recommend using Podman over Docker in the docs?
